name: Dependency Parsing
short_description: Dependency parsing is the task of analyzing the grammatical structure of a sentence.

name: Language Modeling
short_description: Language modeling is the task of assigning a probability to sentences in a language.

name: Machine Translation
short_description: Machine translation is the task of translating text from one language to another.

name: Morphological Analysis
short_description: Morphological analysis is the task of segmenting words into morphemes and identifying their classes.

name: Named Entity Recognition
short_description: Named entity recognition is the task of identifying named entities in text.

name: Sentence Segmentation
short_description: Sentence segmentation is the task of dividing text into sentences.

name: Spellchecking and Correction
short_description: Spellchecking is the task of correcting spelling mistakes in text.

name: Summarization
short_description: Summarization is the task of summarizing a document or article into a shorter text.

name: Text Classification
short_description: Text classification is the task of assigning a set of predefined categories to open-ended text.
